isis.stitle: 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-14613 - AIR SYSTEM - ROADRANGER VALVE A-4900

svcsubproc.title: REMOVAL AND DISASSEMBLY
svcsubproc.para: Remove the two screws holding the bottom cover to the valve and slide the cover down the gear shift lever to expose the air line fittings. Disconnect air lines.
Loosen the jam nut and turn the control valve from the gear shift lever.
Pry the medallion from the recess in the top cover.
Remove the two screws and the top cover from valve housing.
Remove the two screws on the side of the valve housing to separate the housing.
Remove the Range Preselection Lever from the left housing and the position balls and guide from the lever.
If necessary, remove the spring and O-ring from the bores in the left housing.
If necessary, remove the springs, O-ring and sleeve from the bores in the right housing.

svcsubproc.title: REASSEMBLY AND INSTALLATION
svcsubproc.para: Refer Figure 7 for proper reassembly. Use a VERY SMALL amount of silicone lubricant on the O-rings to avoid clogging ports. A small amount of grease on the position springs and balls will help to hold them in place during reassembly.
Reinstall the control valve on the gear shift lever and tighten the jam nut.
Attach the air lines and re-install the bottom cover.
